com.apple.audio.units
Class AudioUnitConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.apple.audio.CAObject
      com.apple.audio.util.CAMemoryObject
          com.apple.audio.units.AudioUnitConnection
public final class AudioUnitConnection
extends CAMemoryObject

Used to contain information about the connection of an AudioUnit to some destination. This is used to set the kAudioUnitPropertyMakeConnection property of an AudioUnit.
